shortDescription: An issue was discovered in /bin/boa on D-Link DIR-619L Rev.B 2.06B1 and DIR-605L Rev.B 2.12B1 devices. goform/formSysCmd allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary OS commands via the sysCmd POST parameter.
vulnerabilityName: D-Link dir-619l_firmware Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
